title: Lung Cancer Immunotherapy Study
summary: This phase 2 clinical trial tests the efficacy of a novel immunotherapy for non-small cell lung cancer. Patients are monitored for tumor regression and immune response over 12 months.

title: Hypertension Treatment Study
summary: A study evaluating the effect of a new blood pressure medication on hypertension. The trial includes 500 participants monitored over a period of 8 months.

title: Diabetes and Insulin Pump Therapy
summary: This trial examines the impact of continuous insulin pump therapy on glucose control in Type 1 diabetic patients over a 6-month period.

title: COVID-19 Vaccine Booster Trial
summary: A clinical study assessing the safety and efficacy of a booster dose of an mRNA-based COVID-19 vaccine, measuring immune response and potential side effects.

title: Stroke Prevention in Atrial Fibrillation
summary: A cardiology trial evaluating a new anticoagulant medication in reducing stroke risk among patients with atrial fibrillation. The study follows 1,200 patients over two years.
